meanings.definition: Used as an expletive to express frustration or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: Goldurn! I dropped my pencil again.
meanings.sent2: Oh, goldurn it! I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent3: Goldurn it, why does it always rain on my birthday?
meanings.sent4: The traffic was moving at a goldurn snail's pace.
meanings.sent5: The loud music next door was a goldurn nuisance.

meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to emphasize a statement.
meanings.sent1: She was goldurn happy to see her best friend.
meanings.sent2: I am goldurn tired after running a marathon.
meanings.sent3: The cat was goldurn curious about the new toy.
meanings.sent4: The sunset was a goldurn beautiful sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was goldurn proud of her students' hard work.
